-- | A library for forming hexdumps.
--   
--   A library for forming hexdumps.
@package hexdump
@version 0.1

module Text.Hexdump

-- | Return a printable character, or a dot.
--   
--   Return a string containing a pretty hexdump of xs using addresses
--   starting at n.
hexdump :: Int -> String -> String
